citation.abstract: The development objective of the Renewable Energy Carbon Development Mechanism (CDM) Program of Activities Project for Tanzania is to increase the capacity of renewable energies installed - including hydro, solar, wind, and or biomass technologies for electricity generation. Negative impacts include: waste, water pollution, noise, health hazard, fire, and accidents. Mitigation measures include: (1) designating special refise and waste collection points (bins) and contract with authorized waste collection companies for right disposal; (2) improving oil handling practices and preventing oil leaks from seeping to the soil; (3) monitoring noise levels to ensure that they are within World Bank guidelines; (4) training the employees on work procedures, health safety, and providing the manuals; (5) training employees to use fire extinguishers; and (6) preparing emergency plan manuals and procedures.
